title: Medieval User Interface - Sound Effects
description: Bring your user interface to life with this sounds!
longDescription:
Hi Dev!


In this package you will find more than 100 sound effects to use in your user interface, and you will even be able to see all the sounds in the preview in use.


Check the preview

Check the documentation


Introduction

You will have access to clicks, hovers, slides, ticks, among others, from several different materials, wood, metal, mechanical, glass, and more. Perfect for games with a medieval theme and a more rustic interface, the sounds will go well with games in this style.


Variety

The sounds were made with user interface in mind, but there are several possible uses, a lever, a small door, an item, as the sounds are made from real materials you can easily apply them in other scenarios if they fit, don't leave the names limit your creativity :)


Quality

All sounds were recorded and edited with professional equipment, ensuring the best possible quality for your game. It is also important to highlight that the sounds were tested in gameplay videos to check if they really work.


Helping each other.

By investing in this package, you get all of this and also help me continue creating. You also have access to my personal email for support with any questions.
technicalDetails:
Number of Audio Waves: 105

Number of Audio Cues: 105

Sample rate / bit rate: (i.e. 22,050 or 44,100 Hz) 44,100

Do Sound FX loop: (Yes/No) No

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: (Yes/No) Yes

Mac: (Yes/No) Yes

Documentation: Link (or a description of where users can find) the documentation

Important/Additional Notes:
